text: SQL-92 ACCESS MODES You can provide hints to the DBMS about whether a txn will modify the database during its lifetime. Only two possible modes: — READ WRITE (Default) —> READ ONLY Not all DBMSs will optimize execution if you § a txn to in READ ONLY mode. ' 117:33/1:20:37 -PA c — 5 $ — O .
